Reviews.Title: I'm loving it!
Reviews.Author: Jamie A. Kenyon "Mom of 5"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this laptop from an outside source(sorry Amazon)and I LOVE it! The keyboard is easy to type on, the touch screen a cool feature and the size is perfect. This is my first new laptop in years. The Windows 8 takes some time to get used to but once you unpin all the stuff you don't need it's quite easy to figure out.

Reviews.Title: Computer OK but HP company hard to deal with.
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these, first one I opened started up fine, second one has a distinct "ticking" noise coming from the top left corner of the keyboard. Ive been trying to deal with HP to get a case number and details on how to return my product for repair. Conversation with warranty has been extremely painful, and I believe they have forgotten about me on hold. I will think twice about purchasing any HP product again due to their poor customer service.

Reviews.Title: Not happy with it.
Reviews.Author: no body
Reviews.Content: First, I hate Windows 8! It completely sucks. It is light, at about 4.5 lbs., but is quite slow. My 7 year old HP is faster. To me the touch screen is a PIA, a mouse is faster, and easier. I will be returning this unit, and going with a more conventional laptop, no touch screen, and with a mouse.

Reviews.Title: good computer, only one problem with speakers
Reviews.Author: Alfredo Frigerio
Reviews.Content: The computer have problems with one speaker, all the rest work ok. Good performance, good looking, hp brand, nothing more to say

Reviews.Title: Customer Service is a joke
Reviews.Author: Ed Highers
Reviews.Content: Computer crashed, had no choice but to call HP customer service.  Over one hour on the phone and I was told I would have to pay $12-$15 for a recovery disc.......That is not customer service, it is customer extortion.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Donna Fairbanks
Reviews.Content: Very good for my household use. Windows 8 takes some getting used to but overall I'm very satisfied.  Would recommend

ProductInfo.Features:
AMD Quad-Core A4-5000
4 GB DIMM
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
14.0-Inch Screen
